name: bfhl-api
description: Objective    Build and host a REST API (Method: POST) that takes in an array and returns the  following:   1. Status   2. User ID   3. Email ID   4. College Roll Number   5. Array for even numbers   6. Array for odd numbers   7. Array for alphabets, converted to uppercase   8. Array for special characters   9. Sum of numbers   10. Concatenation of all alphabetical characters present in the input in the reverse  order in alternating caps
